Ten thousand antennas with 5 to 10 MW transmitter, expected to be operational in northern scandinavia in 4 years. It will be interesting.
Hahahaha! I can already predict reaction of all conspiracy nuts around the world: "It's HAARP! New! Bigger! Stronger! We're all DOOMMEDDDD!!!111!1!1"
